title: Dunerider Boots
summaries: The Dunerider Boots are an accessory that increases the player's maximum movement speed. It can be found in Sandstone Chests in the Underground Desert, and in Oasis Crates or Mirage Crates.
When equipped, it grants the following bonuses:

• Increases the player's maximum movement speed to 22.5 tiles/second (31 mph)
  • When moving on any Sand, Sandstone, or Hardened Sand, increases maximum movement speed by 15% (to 39.38 tiles/second or 54 mph by default) and increases acceleration and deceleration by 75%, from 0.3 tiles/second² to 0.525 tiles/second² and from 0.75 tiles/second² to 1.3125 tiles/second², respectively

statistics.Tooltip:
The wearer can run super fast, and even faster on sand
'Walk without rhythm and you won't attract the worm'
statistics.Sell: 1
